name: Booasm Compressed Archive
summary: Learn about .BOO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: A BOO file is a compressed archive encoded using Microsoft Booasm.arc compression. It is an ASCII archive. BOO files are also referred to as Boo Encoded Files.

instructions: You can use ZipZag (Windows) to open BOO files. To do so, select File â†’ Open Archive... from ZipZag's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your BOO file.
